page.title: 08A FRISKNEY TEACHER
page.content: The school bell rings, it's 8.45. I open my door to find 25 pairs of eyes beaming up at me. They all file in, we settle down for registration and the collection of the dinner money. Â£1 coins make it so much easier! We process to he hall for hymns, prayers and the day's pastoral message. Back in the classroom we discuss today's news, the "bull(vol)cano" in Columbia. Lessons follow in the 3 R's with a 15 min. break at 10.30 for crisps biscuits etc. and a play outside. At noon it's "meat and 2 veg". Today's extra activity is guitar rehearsal. The bell goes at 1.05 and the afternoon begins with activities and a computer game. At 2. 30 I have the top class for music. School ends at 3.05 but it's 3.15 by the time the children have gone. I prepare for the next day and go home-with my marking etc.!!
